name: Defenders of the Atlantic
description:
An entry to the Flare Path's Bismarck anniversary game jam.

A tactical recreation of the Battle of the Denmark Strait's hunt for the Bismarck. A play through should take 5-15 minutes. 

It is recommended to run under Chrome. On Firefox this seems to lag a bit. IE/Edge have not been tested but should work fine.

You will need to click the title screen to start the game.
